BF.Ability.Wisdom.Label: Wisdom
BF.AbilityAssignment.Label: Determine Ability Scores
BF.AbilityAssignment.ScoringMethods.Hint: There are three methods to determine your starting ability scores. No method is “better” than another, but some people like one way more, so we include them to appeal to different kinds of players.
BF.AbilityAssignment.Method.Manual.Label: Manual Assignment
BF.AbilityAssignment.Method.Rolling.Hint: This is the classic, providing surprises and maybe a tough choice. It helps make a character you adapt to, instead of you making all the decisions.
BF.AbilityAssignment.Method.PointBuy.Hin: If you don’t want to leave it up to chance, you can assign ability scores with the point-buy method.
BF.AbilityAssignment.Method.StandardArra: To get started faster, use the standard array.
BF.Advancement.Label: Advancement
BF.Advancement.Core.Title: Custom Title
BF.Advancement.Selection.Title: Select Advancement Type
BF.Advancement.HitPoints.Title: Hit Points
BF.Advancement.HitPoints.Hint: Set an class's hit die size and track a player's hit points as they gain levels.
BF.ArmorClass.Label: Armor Class
BF.ConceptSelection.Title: Select {type}
BF.ConceptSelection.NoOptions: No {typePlural} could be found, create a {type} in the world or enabled a compendium containing {typePlural}.
BF.Identifier.Label: Identifier
BF.Identifier.Hint: Simplified and non-localized version of name used for internal lookups.
BF.Identifier.Error.Invalid: Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
BF.Initiative.Label: Initiative
BF.Item.Description.Label: Description
BF.Item.Journal.Label: Journal Entry
BF.Item.Journal.Hint: Link to a journal entry with an extended description of this item.
BF.Item.Source.Label: Source
BF.Item.Source.Hint: Source book or module where this item originated.
BF.Luck.Label: Luck
BF.Proficiency.Label: Proficiency
BF.Progression.Label: Progression
BF.Settings.AbilitySelectionManual.Label: Allow Manual Ability Assignments
BF.Settings.AbilitySelectionManual.Hint: Allow players to manually set their ability scores rather than using the standard selection methods.
BF.Settings.AbilitySelectionReroll.Label: Allow Re-rolls on Ability Scores
BF.Settings.AbilitySelectionReroll.Hint: Allow players to re-roll when using the rolling ability score selection method.
BF.Settings.ProficiencyMode.Label: Proficiency Variant
BF.Settings.ProficiencyMode.Hint: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll.
